pages.title: Malum Set
pages.text: Who said cultists couldn't collect cards? Malum Cards require a Spirit Ritual to conjure Malum cards. There are 18 cards to collect

pages.title: Malum Medal
pages.text: Upon completing the set, you can use a medal with a Malum Card in hand to be granted the Malum Medal.

pages.title: Buddycard Ritual I
pages.text: The ritual for these trading cards requires reaping the souls of children. Luckily, there's a handy ring for that! The Childish Ring will increase the number of souls reaped from Baby Villagers, Baby Piglins, and the like. Can be upgraded via additional Spirit Ritual.

pages.title: Buddycard Ritual II
pages.text: The Childish Spirit is required for the ritual. Perform a Spirit Ritual with four Childish Spirits, six Shredded Buddycards (can be obtained by cutting cards at a Cutting Board), and six pieces of Paper to obtain a Malum Set.
